low_cancellation_fee_for_SME_business_cu: Low cancellation fee for SME business customers

login_with_otp_subtitle_2: Please enter your OTP which has been sent to your email id
forgot_subtitle: Enter your email address below to reset your password

password_not_matching: Confirm password does not match the new password entered above
msg_invalid_email: The input is not a valid email
msg_invalid_pnr: The input is not a valid PNR
attention_subtitle: Please response below PNR and avoid no show
queue_list_subtitle: This queue list shows current flight disruptions in a prioritized queue format. It allows for efficient management and response by clearly presenting ongoing issues, helping to streamline resolution efforts and enhance overall operational efficiency.
pnr_list_subtitle: Select below rescheduled PNR to apply changes
queue_number_subtitle: Enter queue no auto populate on purpose
cron_time_subtitle: You Can select customized, daywise, time wise
queue_conditions_subtitle: You can add multiple condition and also save reuse it
passenger_preferred_action: Please select below passanger and preferred action
sucessfull_msg: You have successfully accepted the flight reschedule
sucessfull_msg_subtitle: Please check your mail we have sent an updated ticket copy
planB_help_text: Change of plans? Change your booking to suit your travel needs. It's as simple as entering your PNR / booking reference number and email ID / last name
no_record_found: Sorry! No record found based on your search
pax_selection_description: For all the passengers listed above, it is confirmed that this PNR will be accepted for the rebooked flights mentioned above.
pax_downsize_description: Selected passenger going to be cancelled (downsize) and remaining passenger will be active in this PNR
select_date_msg: Please select you conveniant date for flight depature
select_date_from_msg: Select date(s) from calender to enable button
select_option_msg: Select any option to enable button
flight_select_msg: Please select a flight with a higher passenger count..
decline_msg: Should you choose to decline the offer, rest assured, your refund
decline_voucher_msg: will be issued as a voucher for your convenience.
view_pnr_info_help_text: Please carefully review the re-booked flight information below. If everything looks good, you can accept the changes as is, modify any details if necessary, or decline the rebooking.
score_settings_description: Setting up an airline flight disruption management system involves using a score-based framework to prioritize and address disruptions efficiently. By scoring passengers and flights based on urgency and impact, airlines can allocate resources effectively, streamline responses, and enhance both operational efficiency and passenger experience.
review_itinerary_changes_description: Kindly examine the updated PNR details for the rebooked flight.
how_do_you_want_to_proceed?: How do you want to proceed?
rebooked_flight_description: Please indicate your choice from the following options: "Accept" to confirm the provided details, "Decline" if the revised schedule is unsuitable, "Modify" to make adjustments based on your preferences, or "Custom" if you have specific requirements or preferences to communicate.
passenger_content: Setup a desired attribute score for passenger prioritizations
flight_content: Setup a desired attribute score for flight prioritizations
would_you_like_to_change_the_passengers_: Would you like to change the passengers list
review_flight_description: Please acknowledge the adjustment of the above flights for the upcoming journey by clicking confirm button.
reject_flight_description: If you wish to reject the changes, please click the confirm button
review_flight_confirm_popup_description: Are you sure you want to accept?
review_flight_decline_popup_description: Are you sure you want to decline?
review_flight_cancel_popup_description: Are you sure you want to cancel?
review_flight_modify_popup_description: Are you sure you want to modify?
special_Service_description: We are offering the best prices for our ancillary services and seat upgrades
select_pax_msg: Select passenger from passengers list to choose
we_send_mail_all_your_changes_informatio: We send mail all your changes information for your reference
preplanned_disruption_list_description: The PNR disruption list provides details and information about PNRs that have been affected or altered. This list serves as a reference for any changes or cancellations to help manage and communicate disruptions efficiently.
click_drag_file: Click or drag file to this area to upload
supported_file: Supported file formats are CSV, XLS, XLXS
invalid_password_msg: Password must be at least 6 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character!
invalid_address_msg: Invalid address! Only letters, numbers, spaces, and ,.'/- are allowed.
policy_list_description: Explore our established policies for managing and mitigating flight disruptions. These guidelines and procedures are designed to enhance operational efficiency and improve the passenger experience by ensuring effective responses to disruptions.
auto_reassign_policy_list_description: Explore our automated procedures for automatically reassigning passengers to alternative flights when disruptions occur. Understand the criteria and conditions that trigger automatic re-accommodation and how we prioritize passenger comfort and convenience.
policy_description: Setting up an airline flight disruption policy and policy engine involves implementing guidelines and procedures to manage and respond to disruptions efficiently. Explore policy and policies for managing and mitigating flight disruptions to enhance operational efficiency and passenger experience.
policy_modal_title: How would you create your policy condition?
policy_condition_1: Assistive mode : Drag and drop criteria with custom values.
policy_condition_2: Expert mode : Utilize logical operators like OR, AND, and NOT for complex conditions.
confirm_score_saving_description: Are you sure you want to save the current score? This action cannot be undone.
cancel_pnr_description: Are you sure you want to cancel the PNR? This action cannot be undone.
reaccommodate_flight_description: Setting up an airline flight disruption policy and policy engine involves implementing guidelines and procedures to manage and respond to disruptions efficiently. Explore policies for managing and mitigating flight disruptions to enhance operational efficiency and passenger experience.
policy_condition_description: Drag a desired condition for the trigger
policy_action_description: Drag a desired action for the trigger
create_policy_modal_description: Are you sure you want to save the '{{policy_name}}' policy?
update_policy_modal_description: Are you sure you want to update the '{{policy_name}}' policy?
delete_policy_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{policy_name}}' policy?
if_description: Drop the desired condition for the policy
when_description: Choose a trigger to apply the policy
then_description: Drag the actions that will be executed if the condition of the automation are met.
delete_score_header: Are you sure you want to delete?
delete_score_description: Are you sure you want to delete the current score? This action cannot be undone.
reset_score_header: Are you sure you want to reset?
reset_score_description: Are you sure you want to reset the current score? This action cannot be undone.
invalid_pnr_description: Entered PNR is not mapped to the logged in user. Kindly enter valid PNR data to proceed further actions.
adhoc_disruption_list_description: The adhoc disruption list outlines flights that have undergone rescheduling, rerouting, or other forms of disruptions. This resource offers comprehensive details to facilitate the management and communication of re-accommodation processes effectively.
session_expired_description: Your session has expired due to inactivity. Please log in again to continue using the application.
send_multiple_mail_confirmation: Do you want to send mail for the selected PNR(s)?
email_sent_pnr: Email sent for the following PNR(s)
payment_heading: Hey, Our transaction methods are very safe and secure
wallet: Wallet (PhonePe, Amazon pay, Mobikwik, Freecharge, Airtel Payments Bank, Ola money, Jio Money)
itinerary_confirm_header: Thank you for accepting the suggested flight changes
itinerary_confirm_description: We have sent a confirmation email with all the updated details for your reference. Please check your inbox to review your new itinerary.
itinerary_decline_header: Alternative Flight Options Coming Your Way
itinerary_decline_description: Rest assured, we are actively looking into more flight options to better suit your needs. Our team is committed to ensuring you have the best travel experience possible.
itinerary_cancelled_description: We understand that the suggested flight changes didn't work for you.
itinerary_voucher: We've also sent a refund voucher of
itinerary_decline_check_description: for your booking. Please check your email for details and instructions.
view_users_description: The user list page provides an organized dashboard to manage user accounts, displaying key details and enabling actions like viewing and editing user information. Administrators can filter the user list and quickly access necessary user data.
add_user_description: The add user page allows administrators to create new user accounts by filling out detailed user information, including personal and contact details.
edit_user_description: The edit user page enables administrators to update existing user account information, ensuring all user data remains accurate and up-to-date.
delete_user_popup_description: Are you certain you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
subject: Subject
add_contact_info: Add contact info to re-assign this PNR
disbled_messages_description: Sending text messages is currently unavailable
